title: Pixel 3 won't cast Chrome videos to Chromecast Ultra.
content:
Everything works between my Pixel3 and Chromecast except for videos from Chrome. When I do cast a video from chrome it's just loading forever on my TV. All other apps cast videos just fine.

- Pixel 3 is Android 10
- Chromecast Ultra
- Casting chrome videos from a laptop works fine so it's not a Chromecast issue.
